Gunmen in Nigeria kidnap six students, three teachers in southwestGunmen in Nigeria kidnapped six students and three teachers from a school in southwestern Ekiti state on Monday night, the state government said on Tuesday, in the country's first reported abduction involving school children this year. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:14:08 GMT FQIXCQIF6BOC5DWOBJYADTUABU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/gunmen-nigeria-kidnap-six-students- Three-teachers-southwest-2024-01-30/Reuters世界非洲
Hungary's Orban ready to soften stance on EU aid for Ukraine - Le Point magazineHungary's Prime Minister Viktor Orban confirmed he was ready to soften his stance on a proposed European Union aid package for Ukraine to be financed from the bloc's budget ahead of an emergency summit this week. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:13:30 GMT JGWXCAZ6XJO67JG4WLLW https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/hungary-orban-ready-soften-stance-eu-aid-ukraine-the-point-magazine-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
El Salvador's Bukele looks set for landslide election win on gang crackdownEl Salvador's President Nayib Bukele, who has described himself as the "World's Coolest Dictator," has in less than five years transformed El Salvador from a country infamous for its record on murder and gangs to a nation with one of the lowest homicide rates in the Americas. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 11:08:43 GMT O7AWPTJ4BJMQXEI6OK3NL5DTBE https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/el-salvadors-seed-looks-set-landslide-election-win-gang-crackdown-2024-01-30/Sarah Kinosian, Nelson Renteria世界美洲
Who is Imran Khan, former Pakistan PM jailed for 10 years?Former Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan's 10-year jail sentence under the official secrets act is the latest in a series of ups and downs for the charismatic cricket star who is barred from elections next week but looms large over the country's politics. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 10:59:15 GMT KIWOXRA7DJI5HIGH7EQVV737MI https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/imran-khan-pakistan-cricket-star-turned-pm-jailed-10-years-2024-01-30/Gibran Peshimam世界亚太地区
UN envoy in divided Cyprus explores prospect of new talksAn envoy for U.N. Secretary General Antonio Guterres started contacts on divided Cyprus on Tuesday, seeking to break years of stalemate in peace talks. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 10:58:00 GMT GQ4JM5M4GJNAJJJBUVMUUQLR2E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/an-envoy-divided-cyprus-explores-prospect-new-talks-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Kremlin, asked about potential US strikes on Iran, calls for all sides to de-escalateThe Kremlin, asked on Tuesday about potential U.S. strikes on Iranian interests, said tensions in the Middle East were high and that steps were needed to de-escalate rather than destabilise the wider region. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 10:03:36 GMT DBN377S7GJPMXCYI6JNFME2MJE https://www.reuters.com/world/kremlin-asked-about-pottial-us-strikes-iran-calls-all-sides-to-escalate-2024-01-30/Reuters世界
Israel hands over bodies of Palestinians killed in Gaza - Palestinian health officialsIsrael on Tuesday handed over to Palestinian authorities the bodies of dozens of Palestinians killed by Israeli forces in Gaza in recent weeks, health officials in the Palestinian enclave said. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 09:42:18 GMT AIPVNDC775OCJMIVOSJOZ7GAVY https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-hands-over-bodies-palestinians-killed-gaza-palestinian-health-officials-2024-01-30/Reuters世界中东地区
Kremlin says 'we don't accept' doping ban on teenage Olympic figure skaterThe Kremlin on Tuesday condemned a doping ban on teenage figure skater Kamila Valieva and the stripping of an Olympic gold medal from her and her team mates, saying Russia would try to contest the decisions. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 09:35:05 GMT I3MVRGSEZFKO7IFQNKJ7QGT5BU https://www.reuters.com/sports/kremlin-says-it-does-not-accept-valieva-doping-ban-2024-01-30/Reuters运动的
EU leaders to pledge continued military support to Ukraine at summit - draft textEuropean Union leaders will restate their determination to continue to provide "timely, predictable and sustainable military support" to Ukraine at a summit on Thursday, according to draft conclusions of the meeting. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 09:03:39 GMT奥拉AUQB37JMCZPIDK6AJJ4CQWI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/eu-leaders-pledge-continued-military-support-ukraine-summit-draft-text-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Russian dissident Kara-Murza moved to punishment cell in new prison - lawyerRussian opposition politician Vladimir Kara-Murza has been transferred to a new penal colony in the Omsk region of Siberia and placed in a punishment block, his lawyer was quoted as saying on Tuesday. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 08:25:32 GMT BHVJQGZR5RKN5LGRXZQ3U6KMSA https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russian-dissident-kara-murza-transferred-punishment-cell-new-prison-media-cites-2024-01-30/Reuters世界欧洲
Pakistan court jails ex-PM Imran Khan for 10 years days ahead of pollsA Pakistan court sentenced Imran Khan to 10 years' jail on Tuesday for leaking state secrets, his party said, the harshest sentence against the former prime minister and cricketer in multiple cases coming just days before national elections. Tue, 30 Jan 2024 07:36:32 GMT QZDQIVXNHVLRBKJX53QWROADZQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/former-pakistan-pm-imran-khan-gets-10-year-jail-term-leaking-state-secrets-geo-2024-01-30/Gibran Peshimam, Ariba Shahid世界亚太地区
